title: Coleman Hawkins & Clark Terry - 1962 - Back In Bean's Bag (1
description:
Coleman Hawkins & Clark Terry - 1962 - Back In Bean's Bag (1998)
Vinyl 24 bits 96 KHz

Hawkins teamed up with the personable trumpeter Clark Terry for this upbeat set of of solid swing. Terry in particular is in exuberant form on "Feedin' the Bean" and a delightful version of "Don't Worry About Me," but Hawkins's playing (particularly on the trumpeter's ballad "Michelle") is also in fine form. The Tommy Flanagan Trio assists the two classic hornmen on this superior LP. (AllMusic)
Just another album that would've deserve a better revue on allmusic.

Track list:
01 - A Tune For The Tutor
02 - Don't Worry 'Bout Me
03 - Just Squeeze Me (But Don't Tease Me)
04 - Feedin' The Bean
05 - Michelle
06 - Squeeze Me

Personnel:
Tommy Flanagan - Piano
Dave Bailey - Drums
Major Holley - Bass
and...
